HeroMission.Hero_Story_Parent_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="fb448ca5ed3b44a89f59c164c7bbca98" Scale="1"/]Collect Missing Ship Parts
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea002_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="35bdc3c445384fabb3a2b64ad0195ff1" Scale="1"/]I must collect [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum} ship parts[System:Color name="Default"] in order to repair
the S.S. Dolphin, or at least increase the
engine's output significantly.
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea003_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d0473eda61a04f0691f65e602803b017" Scale="1"/]If I want to expand my search area, I will need
to collect [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum} ship parts[System:Color name="Default"].
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea010_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="07cebef3c2f7476380119c012db49cac" Scale="1"/]I'll need [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum} ship parts[System:Color name="Default"] to increase the S.S.
Dolphin's flight radius. That's quite...a lot.
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7d081c2d36b745a7ae5be58d348812ce" Scale="1"/]Once I have [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum} ship parts[System:Color name="Default"] in my possession,
I should finally be able to get off this planet!
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="cc9bef0af3ee4280b831d122dad8ac4b" Scale="1"/]Collect All Ship Parts
